actionList:
<% for(var actionName in actions){ var action = actions[actionName];%>
<%=actionName%>
<% for(var inputName in action.inputs){ var variableName = action.inputs[inputName];%>
<%=inputName%> in <%=variableName%>
<% } %> <% for(var outputName in action.outputs){ var variableName = action.outputs[outputName];%>
<%=outputName%> out <%=variableName%>
<% } %>
<% } %>

<%=variable.range.min%> <%=variable.range.max%> <% if(typeof variable.range.step == "number"){ %> <%=variable.range.step%> <% } %>
<% } if(variable.enum instanceof Array){ %>
